title: Critical Missing Person Located - Eddie Deforce Carroll
body:
Prince George’s County, Maryland…The Prince George’s County Police Department has located critical missing 68-year-old Eddie Deforce Carroll.  Carroll was located at 9 p.m. last night in Washington D.C.  He was returned to his family safely and unharmed. For further information call the Prince George's County Police Department’s Press Information office at (301) 772-4710.

Prince George's County Police
